SUMMARY: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

Class Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter

Extends Ext.ux.netbox.core.Filter.
Defined in CompositeFilter.js

The class implements composite filter, for example (A=1 AND B=2) OR C=3 is a composite filter. Since the logical operators (AND,OR) are binary operator, a composite filter has 2 sides (the left and the right one), and the logical operator between the 2. More composite filters can be built combining other composite filter. For example (A=1 AND B=2) OR C=3 is a composite filter which has on the left a composite filter A=1 AND B=2 and on the right an elementary filter (C=3).

Constructor Detail

Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter

Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter(left, logicalOperator, right)
    It create a new composite filter
    Parameters:
      Ext.ux.netbox.core.Filter left - The left side of the composite filter
      String logicalOperator - The logical operator. Must be one between Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter.AND and Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter.OR. If not an exception is thown.
      Ext.ux.netbox.core.Filter right - The right side of the composite filter. Can be null. If null the value of logical operator is ignored.

setLogicalOperator

setLogicalOperator(logicalOperator)
    This method sets the logical operator of this composite filter and fires the event operatorChanged. The logical operator must be one among Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter.AND and Ext.ux.netbox.core.CompositeFilter.OR. If not an exception is thrown.
    Parameters:
      String logicalOperator - The logical operator
    Throws:
      String If the logical operator is unknown
